channel.title: I makin a PVP only i need help of safe spots
channel.description: i makin pvp i dont how to make safe spots can anyone tell me?

item.title: I makin a PVP only i need help of safe spots
item.dc:creator: @Aurelia Aurelia
item.description:
@Aurelia wrote:

Safe Zones are like squares a rectangle whatever you name it.

This is the safe zone code for 508 servers

absX >= 3040 && absX <= 3395 && absY >= 3523 && absY <= 4000

You run south and type in ::mypos or ::coords whatever it is and then copy the coordinates into notepad
For the FIRST absX >= 3040 put in the first coordinate and for the first absY <= 3523 put in the second.

Then run north and do the same thing but for the second absx and absy

Read full topic
item.source: I makin a PVP only i need help of safe spots
